## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r load}
data <- read.csv("activity.csv")
```



## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r dplyr, output=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r mean}
dataMean  <- filter(data, !is.na(steps)) %>% group_by(date) %>% summarize(mean=mean(steps))
hist(dataMean$mean,col="blue",breaks=100,main="Histrogram of mean steps",xlab="Means steps by day")
```
